content:
During the last day, on March 27, Russian troops fired 144 settlements in 17 regions of Ukraine.

About thisinformsMilitary Media Center.

"In general, from different types of weapons - mortars, tanks, artillery, RSSV, ZRK, OTRC, UAV and tactical aviation - 144 settlements and 174 infrastructure sites were attacked," the statement reads.

As a result of a hostile attack, they are killed and injured among civilians, the number of victims is clarified.

As reported by the Armyinform, at night the Russians during a massive combined attack againThey hiton energy facilities in several regions of Ukraine.
title: During the day, Russia fired at 17 regions of Ukraine
